entry.data:
MOSTLY SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE MID 50S
NORTHWEST WINDS 10 TO 15 MPH

MOSTLY CLEAR
COOLER WITH LOWS IN THE UPPER 20S
NORTHWEST WINDS 10 TO 15 MPH

SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE MID 40S
NORTHWEST WINDS 10 TO 15 MPH

CLEAR
LOWS IN THE UPPER 20S
NORTHWEST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH, BECOMING SOUTHWEST AFTER MIDNIGHT

SUNNY
NOT AS COOL WITH HIGHS IN THE MID 60S
SOUTHWEST WINDS 15 TO 20 MPH WITH GUSTS UP TO 30 MPH

PARTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE MID 30S
HIGHS IN THE MID 50S

PARTLY CLOUDY IN THE EVENING, THEN BECOMING MOSTLY CLOUDY
A 30 PERCENT CHANCE OF SHOWERS
LOWS AROUND 40

PARTLY SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 50S

PARTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE UPPER 30S
HIGHS AROUND 60
